title: Star Wars mansion with SHRINE to the film is sold for $3m
text:
A high-tech mansion equipped with its own Star Wars-themed theater and media center sold last month for just under $3 million.

The nod to the blockbuster movie franchise is clearly seen throughout the villa which is listed as one of Houston's top 10 most expensive homes sold in September.

The Tuscan-style home located at 5409 Valerie St., Bellaire, sold between $2.5 million and $2.9 million and was Houston's seventh-most expensive home sold in September, according to data provided by the Houston Association of Realtors.

This Star Wars themed property sold as one of the most expensive properties in September at just under $3 million

The media room is kitted out as a shrine to the movie series with stars studded in to the ceiling and planets and spacecraft dotted around the walls of the room

The Tuscan-style home also takes on a similarity to the sand igloos on the planet Tatooine

The home's media room is decked out in images of the solar system, space ships and LED color changing stars, complete with spacious couches and a dining area.

Not only is the Star Wars center decked out with alien glowing LEDs, the front of the house lights up the pool near the entrance.

Directly outside of the theater is an entryway that doubles as a concession stand and features framed Star Wars movie posters that line the walls.

The front of the house lights up as an infinity pool appears at the front of the entrance

Even the pictures on the walls appears to be a nod to the tall, horselike creatures, the Tauntaun, from the legendary 1980 movie, Episode V: The Empire Strikes Back

The property is finished in a cream and grey color palette, presumably meant to resemble the sand igloos on the planet Tatooine as seen in Star Wars Episode IV: A New Hope.

Even the pictures on the walls resemble the tall, horselike creatures, the Tauntaun, from the legendary 1980 movie, Episode V: The Empire Strikes Back.

Though the previous owners definitely had a theme in mind, the property is still contemporary and functional.

Though the previous owners definitely had a theme in mind, the property is still contemporary and functional

It is located on almost half of an acre and measures a comfortable 9,182-square-foot. The realtors say it 'boasts a backyard paradise complete with a covered loggia and fireplace'

There is an outdoor kitchen, infinity edge pool and a water garden and the property itself 9,182 square-foot.

It is located on almost half of an acre and measures a comfortable 9,182-square-foot. The realtors say it 'boasts a backyard paradise complete with a covered loggia and fireplace.'
description: A high-tech mansion in Houston, equipped with its own Star Wars-themed theater and media center was one of the priciest homes sold in Houston last month at just under $3 million.
